availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Lawrence Tyler Johnson (Louisville, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Louisville native. Daughter of Robert Tyler and Mary Lawrence Tyler. Married to Charles F. Johnson. Member of the Episcopal Church in Louisville.

ab.bibl: "Mrs. Mary Lawrence Johnson Passes to Her Reward," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), June 4, 1898, p. 4. "Tribute of Affection. Immense Outpouring of People at Mrs. Mary Lawrence Tyler Johnson's Funeral," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), June 6, 1898, p. 6. Find A Grave, "Mary Lawrence Tyler Johnson (1835-1898)," Memorial #100016950, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100016950/mary-lawrence-johnson (accessed January 10, 2018).
